visual_critiques: Background: Original is off-white/cream (#F8F8F8), Generated is dark blue (#2A3747).
Header background: Original is white, Generated is dark blue, blending with the page background.
Text color: Original uses dark grey/black text (#242220), Generated uses white text.
Accent color (links/buttons): Original uses a vibrant green (#50FA7B) for 'Get Started' button and some links, Generated uses light blue (#68BFF9) for the button and no specific accent for links.
Main heading font: Original uses a bolder, larger sans-serif font, Generated uses a smaller, less prominent font.
Navigation links: Original has subtle grey navigation links; Generated has white navigation links.
Footer background: Original has a distinct white background with a dark promotion section. Generated has a unified dark background for both the promotion and footer.
Call to action button in header: Original 'Get Started' button is vibrant green; Generated is light blue.
Footer company name and copyright: Original uses 'Astral' logo and text (#242220); Generated uses 'Astral, inc.' in white text.
Product versions in footer: Original lists products vertically with version numbers. Generated lists products horizontally with different spacing and font.
Promotional section gradient: Original has a subtle dark gradient (#1E1E1E to #0E0E0E) behind the 'Supercharge your Python tooling' text. Generated uses a solid dark blue (#2A3747) background.
Author/Date line: Original has 'Zanie Blue' and date (#242220) with a light grey background for the whole header area, Generated combines them with no specific background for the line itself.
List item markers: Original uses standard bullet points for lists; Generated uses hyphens and sometimes no clear marker for lists.
Code snippets/inline code: Original uses a distinct `monospace` font with a light background for inline code. Generated does not visually distinguish inline code.
Logo: Original has a small 'Astral' logo in the top left corner. Generated has no logo.
